thread.section_title: CardKangaroo.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CardKangaroo.com | cardkangaroo.com | 4 of 86
thread.title: Zachary

author: Zachary
title: Zachary
text: I was at a bloomingdales looking for suits when I decided to check if I could get a reduced price gift card to save some extra $$. It was my first purchase with card kangaroo and it was great. Once I purchased the card, they called me within minutes to verify my account. Another couple minutes later I had my gift via email. It couldn't have been easier, and it saved me a bunch of money. Thanks!
